```{r}
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(emmeans)
```


```{r}
(df <- read.csv('~/Documents/Work/dissertation/Cognition-FFR-passive-2025/analysis/plvs.csv'))
```

```{r}
df$passive <- as.factor(df$passive)
df$stim_freq <- as.factor(df$stim_freq)
df$accuracy_group <- as.factor(df$accuracy_group)
```

```{r}
model <- lmer(plv ~ passive * stim_freq * accuracy_group + (1 | sub), data = df)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
# Post-hoc comparisons
emm <- emmeans(model, ~ stim_freq, adjust = 'tukey')
print(emm)
pairs(emm)
d_emm <- eff_size(emm, sigma = sigma(model), edf = df.residual(model))
print(d_emm)
```
